author: Dion Nissenbaum
title: U.S. Says Syria Is Moving to Conceal Chemical Weapons Use Amid Rise in Attacks
text:
WASHINGTON—The Trump administration warned Syria about an increase in the use of poison gas against civilians, despite last year’s cruise-missile strike aimed at deterring the Assad regime from carrying out such attacks.
U.S. officials on Thursday said the Syrian military was shifting tactics to try to conceal its role in using such weapons. And they said the Trump administration wouldn’t rule out another military strike against President Bashar al-Assad’s military if he doesn’t stop the attacks.
...
